Lorain.Amherst, Ohio:
Amherst () is a city in Lorain County, Ohio, United States. The population was 12,021 at the 2010 census.


== History ==

The original village which eventually became known as Amherst, was established/founded by pioneer settler Josiah Harris  (who relocated to this area about 1818), although the original tiny village was first known only as "Amherst Corners" in the early-1830s.
